divs: Sighting DetailsThird sighting in a week. This object was unlike my first two reported sighting. It had two red blinking lights one would blink then the second in sequence. about 2 seconds apart. It moved silently through he air. Look as though it was following interstate 16 as it went by. It was a fairly large object and traveled much faster than commercial planes in comparison to speed. An example would be a single prop Cessna : an airliner , as the airliner : this UFO respectively. The spacing between the lights was quite large I would think 300ft to 400ft in length. I have been seeing strange crafts in this area now for weeks and have been making a habit of staying out at night looking for them. After the craft was out of visual range more air traffic filled the skies and what sounded like a jet once again would be heard about 20 minutes after it left the area.
Summary: Large object moving from SE to N
trends: There has been one other sighting in Danville
There were no other sightings in Danville on or around December 19th 2012
